verses.verse: וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shev Then he brought me back אֹתִ֗י <WH853> 'o-Ti, דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar of the gate הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <WH4720> ham-mik-Dash sanctuary הַֽחִיצ֔וֹן <WH2435> ha-chi-Tzon, of the outward הַפֹּנֶ֖ה <WH6437> hap-po-Neh which looketh קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> ka-Dim; toward the east וְה֖וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and it was סָגֽוּר׃ <WH5462> sa-Gur. and it [was] shut

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> 'e-Lai about יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD הַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> hash-Sha-'ar unto me This gate הַזֶּה֩ <WH2088> haz-Zeh This סָג֨וּר <WH5462> sa-Gur shall be shut יִהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo and no יִפָּתֵ֗חַ <WH6605> yip-pa-Te-ach, it shall not be opened וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ve-'Ish and no man לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- and no יָ֣בֹא <WH935> Ya-vo shall enter ב֔וֹ vo, כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in by it because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei- the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בָּ֣א <WH935> ba hath entered ב֑וֹ <WH99999> vo; וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become סָגֽוּר׃ <WH5462> sa-Gur. in by it therefore it shall be shut

אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנָּשִׂ֗יא <WH5387> han-na-Si, [It is] for the prince נָ֥שִׂיא <WH5387> Na-si the prince ה֛וּא <WH1931> hu he יֵֽשֶׁב־ <WH3427> ye-shev- he shall sit בּ֥וֹ bo ; לֶאֱכֹול־ le-'e-chol- כלֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> le-'e-chol- to eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH398> Le-chem in it to eat קלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD מִדֶּ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> mid-De-rech by the way אֻלָ֤ם <WH197> 'u-Lam of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> hash-Sha-'ar of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo, he shall enter וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> u-mid-dar-Ko by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> ye-Tze. and shall go out

וַיְבִיאֵ֜נִי <WH935> vay-vi-'E-ni Then brought דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> de-rech- he me the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַצָּפוֹן֮ <WH6828> hatz-tza-fOn of the north אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei before הַבַּיִת֒ <WH1004> hab-ba-Yit the house וָאֵ֕רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re and I looked וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> ma-Le filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> che-Vod- and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> va-'ep-Pol and I fell אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on פָּנָֽי׃ <WH6440> pa-Nai. upon my face

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> 'e-Lai about יְהֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> sim mark לִבְּךָ֩ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha well וּרְאֵ֨ה <WH7200> u-re-'Eh and behold בְעֵינֶ֜יךָ <WH5869> ve-'ei-Nei-cha with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֣יךָ <WH241> u-ve-'a-ze-Nei-cha with thine ears שְּׁמָ֗ע <WH8085> she-Ma', and hear אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> me-dab-Ber all that I say אֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> 'o-Tach, לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all חֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> chuk-Kot unto thee concerning all the ordinances בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- all; תֹּורֹתֹו to-ro-tov כתֹּֽורֹתָ֑יו <WH8451> to-ro-Tav; bullock קוְשַׂמְתָּ֤ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta thereof and mark לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha well לִמְב֣וֹא <WH3996> lim-Vo the entering in הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, of the house בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> be-Chol all מוֹצָאֵ֥י <WH4161> mo-tza-'Ei with every going forth הַמִּקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <WH4720> ham-mik-Dash. of the sanctuary

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And thou shalt say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֶ֙רִי֙ <WH4805> me-ri to the rebellious אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit [even] to the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD רַב־ <WH7227> rav- let it suffice לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol of all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH8441> to-'a-vo-tei-Chem you of all your abominations בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בַּהֲבִיאֲכֶ֣ם <WH935> ba-ha-vi-'a-Chem In that ye have brought בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <WH5236> ne-Char, alien עַרְלֵי־ <WH6189> 'ar-lei- uncircumcised לֵב֙ <WH3820> lev in heart וְעַרְלֵ֣י <WH6189> ve-'ar-Lei and uncircumcised בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> va-Sar, in flesh לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot to be in בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> be-mik-da-Shi to be in my sanctuary לְחַלְּל֣וֹ <WH2490> le-chal-le-Lo to pollute אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּיתִ֑י <WH1004> bei-Ti; it [even] my house בְּהַקְרִֽיבְכֶ֤ם <WH7126> be-hak-ri-ve-Chem when ye offer אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לַחְמִי֙ <WH3899> lach-Mi my bread חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> Che-lev the fat וָדָ֔ם <WH1818> va-Dam, and the blood וַיָּפֵ֙רוּ֙ <WH6565> vai-ya-Fe-ru and they have broken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֶ֖ל <WH413> 'el because כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8441> to-'a-vo-tei-Chem. of all your abominations

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> she-mar-Tem And ye have not kept מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret the charge קָדָשָׁ֑י <WH6944> ka-da-Shai; of mine holy things וַתְּשִׂימ֗וּן <WH7760> vat-te-si-Mun, but ye have set לְשֹׁמְרֵ֧י <WH8104> le-sho-me-Rei keepers מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֛י <WH4931> mish-mar-Ti of my charge בְּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> be-mik-da-Shi in my sanctuary לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the children נֵכָ֗ר <WH5236> ne-Char, alien עֶ֤רֶל <WH6189> 'E-rel uncircumcised לֵב֙ <WH3820> lev in heart וְעֶ֣רֶל <WH6189> ve-'E-rel nor uncircumcised בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> ba-Sar, in flesh לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יָב֖וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo shall enter אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מִקְדָּשִׁ֑י <WH4720> mik-da-Shi; into my sanctuary לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol of all בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the sons נֵכָ֔ר <WH5236> ne-Char, alien אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch of any stranger that [is] among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, And the Levites אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who רָֽחֲקוּ֙ <WH7368> ra-cha-Ku that are gone away far מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai, and בִּתְע֤וֹת <WH8582> bit-'ot went astray יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El from me when Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who תָּע֣וּ <WH8582> ta-'U which went astray away מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai, and אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei from me after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1544> gil-lu-lei-Hem; their idols וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> ve-na-se-'U they shall even bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam. their iniquity

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become בְמִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> ve-mik-da-Shi in my sanctuary מְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <WH8334> me-Sha-re-Tim, Yet they shall be ministers פְּקֻדּוֹת֙ <WH6486> pe-kud-dOt [having] charge אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> sha-'a-Rei at the gates הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, of the house וּֽמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <WH8334> u-me-sha-re-Tim and ministering אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; to the house הֵ֠מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they יִשְׁחֲט֨וּ <WH7819> yish-cha-Tu they shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַזֶּ֙בַח֙ <WH2077> haz-Ze-vach and the sacrifice לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> la-'Am, for the people וְהֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah and they יַעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> ya-'am-Du and they shall stand לִפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem before לְשָֽׁרְתָֽם׃ <WH8334> le-Sha-re-Tam. them to minister

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an, because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher they יְשָׁרְת֤וּ <WH8334> ye-sha-re-Tu Because they ministered אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei unto them before גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1544> gil-lu-lei-Hem, their idols וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu and became לְבֵֽית־ <WH1004> le-veit- and caused the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> le-mich-Shol to fall עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> 'a-Von; into iniquity עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against כֵּן֩ <WH3651> ken after that נָשָׂ֨אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti therefore have I lifted up יָדִ֜י <WH3027> ya-Di mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, against נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> ne-'Um against them saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> ve-na-se-'U and they shall bear עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam. their iniquity

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יִגְּשׁ֤וּ <WH5066> yig-ge-Shu And they shall not come near אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לְכַהֵ֣ן <WH3547> le-cha-Hen unto me to do the office of a priest לִ֔י Li, וְלָגֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5066> ve-la-Ge-shet unto me nor to come near עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any קָ֣דָשַׁ֔י <WH6944> ka-da-Shai, to any of my holy things אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about קָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> ka-de-Shei in the most holy הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> hak-ke-da-Shim; to the things וְנָֽשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> ve-na-se-'U [place] but they shall bear כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <WH3639> ke-lim-ma-Tam, their shame וְתוֹעֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH8441> ve-to-'a-vo-Tam and their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> 'a-Su. which they have committed

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti But I will make אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> sho-me-Rei them keepers מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret of the charge הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; of the house לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> le-Chol of all עֲבֹ֣דָת֔וֹ <WH5656> a-Vo-da-To, for all the service וּלְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> u-le-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ye-'a-Seh thereof and for all that shall be done בּֽוֹ׃ bo. פ Peh

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> ve-hak-ko-ha-Nim But the priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons צָד֗וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok, of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who שָׁמְר֜וּ <WH8104> sha-me-Ru that kept אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret the charge מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> mik-da-Shi of my sanctuary בִּתְע֤וֹת <WH8582> bit-'ot went astray בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai, and הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like יִקְרְב֥וּ <WH7126> yik-re-Vu from me they shall come near אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לְשָֽׁרְתֵ֑נִי <WH8334> le-sha-re-Te-ni; to me to minister וְעָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> ve-'a-me-Du unto me and they shall stand לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai, before לְהַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> le-hak-Riv me to offer לִי֙ <WH99999> li חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> Che-lev unto me the fat וָדָ֔ם <WH1818> va-Dam, and the blood נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD
